title: GitTogether CDMX - Season of AI
description:
¬°Hola **comunidad**!
Nos emociona informarles que el pr√≥ximo evento se har√° en colaboraci√≥n con **Microsoft Learn Student Ambassadors** y ser√° realizado en las oficinas de **NU M√©xico**.

**Agenda**:

* 5:45 p.m. - Entrada al evento
* 6:00 p.m. - Inicio del evento
* 7:35 p.m. - Networking
* 8:30 p.m. - Cierre del evento

**Asiste presencialmente**
En esta ocasi√≥n, contaremos con el apoyo principal de **Microsoft, Microsoft Learn Student Ambassadors, Plain Sight** y **NU M√©xico** para realizar este evento en sus oficinas.

¬°Habr√° muchas sorpresas!

Para este evento, **les recomendamos llevar sus computadoras** para que puedan practicar lo que ver√°n en la sesi√≥n.

**Fecha l√≠mite de registro:** *Lunes 28 de Abril.*

üì¢ **Este evento es abierto a todas y todos**.
Puedes invitar a tu escuela, comunidad, amistades y familia.
¬°TE ESPERAMOS!

**IMPORTANTE:**
\- Para poder acceder al evento y por cuestiones de seguridad debes de **presentar tu Identificaci√≥n oficial** (INE, Pasaporte) y el correo con el que te registraste a este Meet Up.

title: GitTogether Hyderabad
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** Please register at **[gittogethers.github.io](http://gittogethers.github.io/)** by **12 PM IST on 22rd May**. Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**Theme: AI Agents and the MCP (Model Context Protocol) Paradigm**

Join us for this half-day meetup packed with insights, inspiration, and networking! Sharpen your tech skills and discover incredible open-source projects. What to expect:

* **Tech Sessions**: Dive into the latest open-source technologies with talks by experienced developers. Expand your knowledge and toolkit!
* **Community Spotlight**: Discover a hidden gem! One lucky participant gets to showcase a cool open-source project they've built. Could it be you?

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Agenda**

* 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 10:00 AM to 10:10 AM: **git init (Welcome Note)**
* 10:10 AM to 10:40 AM: **Speaker 1 (**[Speaker Submission](https://gh.io/cfs)**)**
* 10:40 AM to 11:10 AM: **Speaker 2 (**[Speaker Submission](https://gh.io/cfs)**)**
* 11:10 AM to 11:30 AM: **Break and Networking**
* 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM: **Community** **Spotlight (**[Submit for Spotlight](https://gh.io/spotlight)**)**
* 12:00 PM to 12:45 PM: **Speaker 3 (**[Speaker Submission](https://gh.io/cfs)**)**
* 12:45 PM to 1:00 PM: **git merge (Closing Note)**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: Saturday 24th May, 2025

**Time**: 9:30 AM to 1:00 PM IST

**Venue**: TBD

For any queries, please contact [Tanmaiyee Vadloori](https://github.com/Tanmaiyee-Vadloori), Community Volunteer at GitTogether Hyderabad or write to us at meetups@github.com

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**GitTogethers Call for Sessions** üì¢

Are you someone who loves to share your knowledge? Do you have a passion for AI, Developer Experience, or Security?

We're calling for developers to submit their session proposals for upcoming GitTogether events! [Submit your proposal here](https://gh.io/cfs).

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Community Spotlight** üí°

Are you passionate about open-source development and have a project you'd love to share? We're looking for developers like you for spotlight at our upcoming GitTogethers. [Submit your projects here](https://gh.io/spotlight).

title: From Idea to Impact: GitTogether Product Meetup
description:
**GitTogether Delhi NCR, in collaboration with GitHub for Startups, is bringing the magic of collaboration to Product Managers!**

Join us for an exclusive, invite-only evening to empower product managers with the latest AI agentic workflows and product tools to streamline prototyping, enhance team collaboration, and deliver exceptional products faster.

**Watch this space for more details coming soon!!**
No need to waitlist on meetup.com, registrations opening soon.

Reach out to [@vipulgupta2048](https://linkedin.com/in/vipulgupta2048) if you are looking to speak, present, or attend the gathering. Sharing details shortly.

title: Open Source Brasil com Leticia 'Levxyca' Leonardo
description:
üé• **Open Source Friday Brasil ‚Äì edi√ß√£o Esquentas TDC**

Vamos receber **Leticia 'levxyca' Leonardo**, mantenedora do projeto **Diciotech**, um dicion√°rio tech online e colaborativo, constru√≠do com **HTML**, **SASS** e **JavaScript**, totalmente **Open Source**.

A miss√£o do projeto √© ajudar pessoas de todos os n√≠veis a entenderem termos e conceitos relacionados √† tecnologia de forma clara e simples.

Al√©m de falar sobre o projeto e sobre Open Source, essa live ser√° tamb√©m um **esquenta especial para o TDC Floripa**! üåü
Tanto a nossa convidada quanto a host estar√£o presencialmente no evento, e vamos aproveitar para compartilhar um pouco da expectativa, trocar ideias e nos conectar com a comunidade!

Vem aprender, contribuir e se preparar para o TDC Floripa com a gente! üíö
